articles.title: All the U.S. military strikes against alleged drug boats - PBS
articles.description: The U.S. military has killed dozens of people in targeted strikes on small vessels in waters off South America since early September.
articles.content:
The U.S. military has killed dozens of people in targeted strikes on small vessels in waters off South America since early September.
